<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Overpowering Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4829) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 148 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Rivethun Invoker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=309) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
[Barreling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4787)

</column>

---

You trample foes as you charge past. When you use Barreling Charge and successfully move through a creature’s space, that creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier. On a critical success, the creature takes double damage and is off-guard until the end of your next turn.
name: Overpowering Charge
